head.supplied: 27/11/79 ¶ ¶ Be so good, dear Mr Shillinglaw, to send me in time for the outgoing mail two or three copies of the ¶ photolithogram of your father's testimonial ¶ and I will do for you what I can. ¶...

div.p: Box 244/1, Shillinglaw papers, La Trobe Australian manuscripts collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.
Be so good, dear Mr Shillinglaw, to send me in time for the outgoing mail two or three copies of the photolithogram of your father's testimonial and I will do for you what I can.
